amendment.description: To strike the provision requiring the development of coordinated oversight plans and to establish an independent Inspector General at the Office of the Global AIDS Coordinator.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5081 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 179.

action.text: Amendment SA 5081 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S6693-6699; text: CR S6694) To strike the provision requiring the development of coordinated oversight plans and to establish an independent Inspector General at the Office of the Global AIDS Coordinator.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5081 proposed by Senator Gregg.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5081 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 179.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5081 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 179.
